serviceArea.areas: Scottsdale, Phoenix, Paradise Valley, Fountain Hills, Cave Creek, Carefree, Mesa, Tempe

seo.metaDescription: Crystal Clear Pools offers professional pool cleaning, maintenance, and repair services in Scottsdale, AZ. Keep your pool sparkling year-round. Free estimates!
seo.metaKeywords: pool service scottsdale, pool cleaning, pool maintenance, pool repair, swimming pool service arizona

hours.emergencyNote: Emergency service available for equipment failures

services.name: Weekly Pool Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Regular weekly cleaning to keep your pool crystal clear and swim-ready all year.
services.description: Our comprehensive weekly cleaning service includes skimming, brushing, vacuuming, chemical balancing, and equipment checks. We handle everything so you can just enjoy your pool.

services.name: Pool Equipment Repair
services.shortDescription: Expert repair services for pumps, filters, heaters, and all pool equipment.
services.description: From pump failures to filter issues, our certified technicians diagnose and repair all types of pool equipment. We carry parts for most major brands and offer same-day service when possible.

services.name: Green Pool Recovery
services.shortDescription: Transform your green, algae-filled pool back to crystal clear in days.
services.description: Don't drain your green pool! Our proven recovery process eliminates algae and restores water clarity. We've rescued thousands of neglected pools and can save yours too.

services.name: Pool Tile Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Remove calcium buildup and restore the beauty of your pool tile.
services.description: Our bead blasting and acid washing techniques safely remove stubborn calcium deposits, stains, and discoloration from your pool tile and waterline without damaging surfaces.

services.name: Pool Resurfacing
services.shortDescription: Revitalize your pool with professional resurfacing and refinishing services.
services.description: Whether you need plaster repair, pebble finish, or a complete resurface, we transform worn and stained pool surfaces into beautiful, durable finishes that last for years.

services.name: Salt System Installation
services.shortDescription: Convert to a salt water pool for softer water and easier maintenance.
services.description: Enjoy the benefits of salt water swimming! We install and service salt chlorine generators from leading brands. Say goodbye to harsh chlorine and hello to silky smooth water.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Martinez
testimonials.text: Crystal Clear Pools has maintained our pool for 5 years now. They're always on time, professional, and our pool has never looked better. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Robert Thompson
testimonials.text: We bought a house with a neglected green pool. Crystal Clear had it sparkling in just 4 days! Amazing transformation and fair pricing.

testimonials.name: Lisa Chen
testimonials.text: Our pool pump died on a Saturday before a party. They came out same day and had us back up and running. Lifesavers! Great emergency service.

faq.question: How often should I have my pool professionally cleaned?
faq.answer: For most Arizona pools, we recommend weekly service during the swimming season and bi-weekly during cooler months. This keeps chemicals balanced and prevents algae growth in our hot climate.

faq.question: Can you fix my green pool without draining it?
faq.answer: In most cases, yes! Our green pool recovery process can restore even severely neglected pools without draining. This saves water, money, and gets you swimming faster than a drain and refill.

faq.question: Do you service salt water pools?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We service both traditional chlorine and salt water pools. We can also convert your existing pool to a salt system if you're interested in making the switch.
